pkgmetadata.longdescription: ksb26 is a package that redirects tcp connection (to user-defined target hosts) through socks 4/5 chains. It is divided into a kernel module, ksb26, that intercepts and redirects tcp connections, and a userspace manager, ksb26manager, that keeps updated the SOCKS list and loads target hosts list via a character device, /dev/ksb26
